title: Items for sale: Imperial Cabinet Card & Baseball Currency

posts.post_title: Items for sale: Imperial Cabinet Card & Baseball Currency
posts.post_content:
Posted By: ramram
1890 Syracuse American Association team oversized cabinet.  Beautiful albumen image with period identification at bottom.  Is framed and matted.  Size is 15" x 17" (excluding mat and frame).  Ex-Mastro Auction  $1475

Also have a nice condition 1887 Detroit baseball currency (Brouthers, Hanlon, etc.)  $325

[IMG]http://home.kc.rr.com/ramram/1890%20Syracuse%20team.jpg[/IMG]
